full_summary:
================

### Request for Proposal: TBIPS

**Project Title:** Application and System Testing for iSTOP Ongoing Release Upgrades

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01013053

**Solicitation Number:** 1000240926

**Publication Date:** November 9, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 1, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)

### Overview

Health Canada invites qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders to submit a proposal for application and system testing services related to the iSTOP (Integrated Suite of Tools for Operational Processes) ongoing release upgrades. The selected vendor will be required to provide Level 3 Tester services in the National Capital Region for a period of four years.

### Requirements

The successful vendor will be responsible for managing enhanced testing of iSTOP functionalities related to Release(s) 4.6, 5.0, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3, 5.4, 5.5, 5.6, as well as an additional 30 days of testing dedicated to the iSTOP Modernization Project. Enhanced testing will include System Testing and User Acceptance Testing (UAT).

The vendor will also be required to support the CB iSTOP Team in developing and updating the User Acceptance Testing (UAT) Plan as needed throughout these testing periods.

### Eligibility

This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following category: One (1) Level 3 Tester (A.11).

### Pre-qualified Vendors

The following vendors have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 1511995 Ontario Limited, ipss inc., in jv
* ACF Associates Inc.
* Acosys Consulting Services Inc.
* Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
* Cloud SynApps Inc.
* ESIT Canada Enterprise Services Co.
* ESIT Canada Services AuxEntreprises Cie.
* HubSpoke Inc.
* IAN MARTIN LIMITED
* InfoMagnetics Technologies Corporation (IMT)
* Leverage Technology Resources Inc.
* Neosoft Technologies Inc.
* Newfound Recruiting Corporation
* TechWind Inc.
* The Bell Telephone Company of Canada
* Trillys Systems inc.

### Attachments

Tender attachments can be accessed at the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/
